txt.en:
'You have been a good help to me, it is true. What do you think, Mossy? Would Hestil welcome the aid of this [placeholder]? She would?

'Then it's decided! You should go to Hestil's camp and see if you can help my friends with their problems. They do have a lot of problems.

'They're camped on Parth Galen, a grassy lawn to the south-east of here, by a small stream that runs from the large lake in the East Wall.'

Isteron stares at you, but refuses to speak further. You recall his words that his friends are camped on Parth Galen, a grassy lawn to the south-east of here, by a small stream that runs from the large lake in the East Wall.
You met a curious man beneath the East Wall, and he told you of his friends, a party of adventurers camped on Parth Galen.
You have found the camp of Isteron's friends
Find the camp of Isteron's friends on Parth Galen
Isteron's friends are camped on Parth Galen, a grassy lawn to the south-east of the Under-wall tunnels, by a stream that runs from the lake of Nen Hithoel.
